title: Directive for Implementing Cost-Effective Practices in Federal Contracting
summary: This directive establishes the intent of the administration to minimize unnecessary expenditures of taxpayer funds by enhancing oversight and efficiency within federal contracting practices. The order emphasizes adherence to statutory preferences and aims to streamline the federal procurement process to ensure the use of commercial practices that are cost-effective. The measures outlined in this directive are intended to promote fiscal responsibility and increase the overall value of federal contracts.
